segments.text: The boy's face lights up as he retrieves a cookie from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the thrill of victory in his eyes, and it makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the sight of him teetering on that stool fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a slight disgust at the wild abandon they have for the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s hopeful stance reminds me of a puppy begging for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocent excitement is clouded by the risk they are taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As I watch, I wonder how long it will take before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
